## <span style="color:  #710193;"> Bio</span>
<br>
Welcome to my page! I'm a bioinformatician with a deep passion for unraveling the complexities of genomics through innovative computational methods. My expertise spans the development and implementation of several bioinformatics pipelines, with a recent focus on **<span style="color: #710193;">RNA-Seq</span>** and **<span style="color: #710193;">scRNA-seq</span>**. 

I am proficient in **<span style="color: #710193;">R</span>**, **<span style="color: #710193;">Shell</span>**, and Python. I thrive in creating and managing sophisticated workflows using **<span style="color: #710193;">Nextflow</span>**, ensuring efficiency and scalability. My expertise extends to **<span style="color: #710193;">package development</span>** and unit testing, notably as a co-author of the **<span style="color: #710193;">qsvaR R/Bioconductor</span>** package.
